A sandwich pun which the later part is "not ripe doesn't eat". 熟 means both "ripe" and "acquainted, familiar". Mynah birds are good at picking the most tasty and ripe whampee to eat. Figuratively means the scums that like to take advantage of family or friends.)

senses.definition: 字面意思指佛寺；引申指男校（量詞：間） (a figurative way to refer to "boys' school", literally "Buddhist monk monastery")

examples.jyutping: keoi5 baai2 dou3 ming4 hai6 waan2 gaau1 wo3, nei5 mai5 gam3 lou4 hei3 laa1!

examples.text: 阿松佢成日淨係睇啲鹹濕書，真係污穢！

senses.definition: 學名#龍蝨，通常係作為食物時嘅稱呼，外表好似#曱甴，所以亦都俗稱「#水曱甴」 (predaceous diving beetles; dytiscidae, usually referred to as such when served as food; also nicknamed "water cockroach" due to their cockroach-like appearance)

senses.definition: 引申用喺對聽者嘅提醒 (commonly used to remind the hearer of the information conveyed)

senses.definition: 轉述人哋嘅説話，多數係澄清埋唔關講嗰個人事，講者只係負責轉述 (reported speech; to transmit somebody's message, usually clarifying that it is none of the business of the speaker; "it was said that"; "somebody (but not I) said that")

#韞 住喺部#𨋢 入面，出唔返嚟 (to be trapped in a lift; to get stuck in an elevator)

examples.translation: A power outage suddenly occurred in the housing estate, trapping people in elevators.

senses.definition: 因為唔認真、#玩玩下 而搞出問題 (to not take something seriously (just like playing), resulting in great troubles. Literally: to play, and resulting in fire.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gam2 joeng2 zou6 hai6 wui5 ceot1 si6 gaa3! zaan2 waan2 ceot1 fo2 gaa3 zaa3!
examples.translation: Doing it this way will lead to trouble! You're playing with fire!

examples.translation: If anything is missing, please notify me as soon as possible .

examples.translation: The tennis star had to settle for second place in this tournament.

examples.translation: You must handle this task properly; otherwise, you will bear all the consequences.

senses.definition: 一個電腦網絡入面分配網絡封包畀網絡入面唔同電腦嘅機器（量詞：部／嚿／隻／個） (router)

senses.definition: 都有另外嘅可能，唔係咁易預料到 (precarious; who knows; no one knows; possibly; difficult to expect)

senses.definition: 腹足綱動物中生活喺地面有殼品種嘅統稱（同#牛 冇關），瞓覺嘅時候會縮入去，行得好慢；同#螺、#蛞蝓 係近親（量詞：隻） (snail)

examples.jyutping: lok6 jyu5 tin1 zau6 jau5 hou2 do1 wo1 ngau4.
examples.translation: There are many snails on rainy days.

senses.definition: 形容一個人慢慢被難以察覺嘅變化所摧毀 (lit. to boil a frog in warm water)

senses.definition: 「和平、理性、非暴力、非粗口」嘅簡稱，形容香港泛民主派經常強調嘅政治抗爭模式。因為主張呢種模式嘅泛民主派多年嚟喺政治抗爭上被認定寸功未建，所以「和理非非」一詞亦經常用嚟批評泛民主派，帶有貶義。 (An abbreviation for "peaceful, rational, non-violent and foul-language free", describing an approach which had been promoted by the pan-democracy camp in Hong Kong. As the pan-democracy camp is perceived to have had no contribution to democratization for a long time, the abbreviation is always used as sarcasm)

examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 faat3 daat6, keoi5 bat1 sik1 ceot1 maai6 pang4 jau5.
examples.translation: For the sake of being rich, he spared no effort to betray his friends.

senses.definition: #損害、#破壞 (to damage; to ruin)

senses.definition: 移民外地嘅人返去佢哋嘅家鄉、家園、原先嘅居住地 ((of emigrants) to return to one's homeland; literally: back flow)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢以前移咗民過加拿大，最近先回流返嚟香港。

examples.translation: He emigrated to Canada, but he recently moved back to his homeland in Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 男性面上嘅毛嘅統稱，通常會喺青春期開始生（量詞：條／撇／執） (beard; moustache; whiskers)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 會用（一段時間） (for a period of; to last for)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #詩詞 或者#音樂 嘅音調、節奏、格律（量詞：個） (rhythm (of music or poetry))

examples.jyutping: nei1 sau2 kuk1 go3 wan5 leot6 gei2 hou2 wo3.

senses.definition: 𠝹、用利器分開 (to cut; to slash)

senses.definition: 叫醒一個人 (to wake up (somebody); to arouse)

senses.definition: 表示驚訝嘅嘆詞 (wow; used to express surprise and sometimes admiration)
senses.label: 感嘆詞

examples.jyutping: waa3! tiu4 kwan4 hou2 leng3 aa3!
examples.translation: Wow! What a beautiful dress!

senses.definition: 嚴肅、認真嘅態度；會令人尊敬、驚嘅氣勢 (majesty; dignity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 舅父好有威嚴，我好尊敬佢，同時都好驚佢。
examples.jyutping: kau3 fu2 hou2 jau5 wai1 jim4, ngo5 hou2 zyun1 ging3 keoi5, tung4 si4 dou1 hou2 geng1 keoi5.
examples.translation: My uncle is a man of dignity. I respect him a lot, but at the same time I'm afraid of him too.

senses.definition: 死者生前嘅照片或者肖像（量詞：幅） (photograph or portrait of the deceased)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺靈堂度見到佢嘅遺像，真係感慨萬千。
examples.jyutping: hai2 ling4 tong4 dou6 gin3 dou2 keoi5 ge3 wai4 zoeng6, zan1 hai6 gam2 koi3 maan6 cin1.
examples.translation: Seeing his photograph during the funeral made me feel emotional.

senses.definition: 古人留低嘅建築物 (historical remains; historical site; relic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 起沙中線期間，考古專家喺土瓜灣掘咗好多宋元嘅遺址出嚟。
examples.jyutping: hei2 saa1 zung1 sin3 kei4 gaan1, haau2 gu2 zyun1 gaa1 hai2 tou2 gwaa1 waan4 gwat6 zo2 hou2 do1 sung3 jyun4 ge3 wai4 zi2 ceot1 lai4.
examples.translation: Archaeologists have unearthed monuments and antiques of Song and Yuan Dynasties at the construction sites of MTR Shatin Central Link in To Kwa Wan.

senses.definition: 領取一樣新嘅嘢或者禮品 (to collect a replacement or gift)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wun6 ling5 lai6 ban2

senses.definition: 城市名；#奧地利 首都，亦係佢其中一個#邦；以古典音樂著名，亦係繼#紐約、日內瓦之後第三座#聯合國 駐地城市 (Vienna)

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 宜家黃雨喇，出門口要小心啲。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 wong4 jyu5 laa3, ceot1 mun4 hau2 jiu3 siu2 sam1 di1.
examples.translation: The amber rainstorm signal has been hoisted. Be careful when you go out.

senses.definition: 用另一種説法嚟表示；用於總結、又或者改變敍述嘅邏輯 (in other words; let me put it this way; let me rephrase it)

examples.text: 童話入面嘅狐狸通常都係奸角。
examples.jyutping: tung4 waa2 jap6 min6  ge3 wu4 lei2 tung1 soeng4 dou1 hai6 gaan1 gok3.

examples.jyutping: wu1 dai1 san1

examples.text: 有好多藝術家係畫廊交流緊心得。
examples.jyutping: jau5 hou2 do1 ngai6 seot6 gaa1 hai2 waa2 long4 gaau1 lau4 gan2 sam1 dak1.
examples.translation: Many artists are communicating in the gallery.

senses.definition: #回覆；係#讀 完一樣嘢之後，寫返自己嘅意見或者睇法畀#作者 (to reply)

examples.jyutping: ji5 duk6 bat1 wui4
examples.translation: to read (one's messages) without replying

examples.jyutping: wui4 hyut3
examples.translation: to revive or restore the health of an in-game character, which is usually measured in hit points (HP); literally: to restore blood

senses.definition: 乾淨、清潔；令細菌冇咁易滋生、令人唔易染病嘅程度 (hygiene; cleanliness)

examples.jyutping: waan4 ging2 wai6 sang1
examples.translation: environmental hygiene

senses.definition: 作為標準 (to be the standard)

examples.jyutping: jat1 cai3 ji5 jing1 man2 baan2 bun2 wai4 zeon2.
examples.translation: For these Terms and Conditions, the English version shall prevail.

senses.definition: 喺過往幾百年至一萬年內曾經爆發，而家仍然活躍嘅#火山（量詞：個／座） (active volcano)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同心協力渡過難關 (to work together to overcome difficulties)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 難關當前，我哋應該和衷共濟，而唔係搞內訌。
examples.jyutping: naan4 gwaan1 dong1 cin4, ngo5 dei6 jing1 goi1 wo4 cung1 gung6 zai3, ji4 m4 hai6 gaau2 noi6 hung3.
examples.translation: When faced with obstacles, we should work together to overcome them instead of fighting against each other.

senses.definition: 唔再完整、恰當、正常或者有條理；壞咗；亂咗；衰咗 (ruined; spoiled; messed up; out of order)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: waang1 san2
examples.translation: totally out of order

senses.definition: 即係#公仔、#洋娃娃（量詞：個） (doll)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: joeng4 waa1 waa1
examples.translation: doll

senses.definition: 遊戲入面嘅規則 (a set of regulations or rules of a game)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 玩遊戲嘅方式 (a way of playing a game)

examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 jau4 hei3 jau5 gei2 zung2 waan2 faat3.
examples.translation: There are a few ways you can play this game.

senses.definition: 即係「再造紙」；回收之後經過處理再製造嘅紙張（量詞：張） (recycled paper)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢本小冊子係用環保紙印製㗎，所以成本會高少少。
examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 siu2 caak3 zi2 hai6 jung6 waan4 bou2 zi2 jan3 zai3 gaa3, so2 ji5 sing4 bun2 wui5 gou1 siu2 siu2.
examples.translation: This booklet is printed on recycled paper, so the cost is a bit higher.

senses.definition: 為咗環保而重用嘅紙，多數係指一面用過而另一面空白嘅紙張（量詞：張） (paper to be reused, mostly refer to one-sided paper)

examples.text: 印草稿嘅話就用環保紙啦。
examples.jyutping: jan3 cou2 gou2 ge3 waa2 zau6 jung6 waan4 bou2 zi2 laa1.
examples.translation: Please print on one-sided paper for the draft.

senses.definition: 諗起、回憶以前，而有珍惜嘅感覺；掛住、思念 (to miss; to remember; to cherish the memory)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我好懷念以前嘅日子啊。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 waai4 nim6 ji5 cin4 ge3 jat6 zi2 aa3.
examples.translation: I really miss those good old days.

senses.definition: 貴重嘅嘢俾唔值錢嘅嘢遮住，指#人不可以貌相，或者係有人故意用好平凡嘅包裝收埋啲好嘢 (something is far more valuable than it look, or someone hides his assets under a mundane appearance; literally "to hide a pearl in a haystack")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 咪睇達叔平時一身#牛記笠記，其實禾桿冚珍珠，揸住五個的士牌喺手，過千萬身家都嚟喇。
examples.jyutping: mai5 tai2 daat6 suk1 ping4 si4 jat1 san1 ngau4 gei3 lap1 gei3, kei4 sat6 wo4 gon2 kam2 zan1 zyu1, zaa1 zyu6 ng5 go3 dik1 si2 paai4 hai2 sau2, gwo3 cin1 maan6 san1 gaa1 dou1 lai4 laa3.
examples.translation: Don't judge from his shabby looking, Uncle Tat owns 5 Taxi Licences well worth over ten million; he is just hiding the pearl in a haystack.

senses.definition: 死屍；屍體（量詞：副） (corpse;  dead body)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 政府負責將冇人認領嘅遺骸火化。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 fu6 zaak3 zoeng1 mou5 jan4 jing6 ling5 ge3 wai4 haai4 fo2 faa3.
examples.translation: The government are responsible for cremating the unclaimed corpses.

senses.definition: 以後嘅、之後嘅時間 (from now on; later on; in future; going forward)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 市區啲空氣好污濁，搞到我一出去就有打乞嚏。
examples.jyutping: si5 keoi1 di1 hung1 hei3 hou2 wu1 zuk6, gaau2 dou3 ngo5 jat1 ceot1 heoi3 zau6 jau5 daa2 hat1 ci1
examples.translation: The air in the urban area is so polluted and stagnant, which makes me sneeze whenever I go out.

senses.definition: 即係「皇家馬德里足球會」嘅縮寫，係一支位於#西班牙 首都#馬德里 嘅足球會，同同市嘅#馬體會、加泰隆尼亞嘅#巴塞 都係宿敵 (Real Madrid C.F.)

senses.definition: 撈埋一齊、亂嘅；混合攙雜 (mixed; intermingled)

examples.jyutping: gung6 waan6 naan6
examples.translation: to stick with someone through thick and thin

senses.definition: #監獄 (prison)

senses.definition: #香港#政府 嘅剩餘物資，如退役消防車、警車、充公物品等，部分會拎去拍賣 (the valuable waste of Hong Kong government; literally: the Royal Refuse)

senses.definition: #監獄 提供嘅伙食 (prison meal; literally: the Royal Meal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to be imprisoned

senses.definition: 一類生物必需嘅少量營養嘅統稱，通常生物冇辦法自己製造，用嚟調節#新陳代謝（量詞：隻／種） (vitamin)

examples.translation: vitamin C

senses.definition: 預先揀位 (to choose seats beforehand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: When you go to the cinema in North America, seats cannot be chosen beforehand; they are chosen on a first come, first served basis.

examples.translation: to entrust somebody with responsibility

examples.jyutping: soeng4 wai2
examples.translation: standing committee

senses.definition: 白費，做完啲嘢或者得到啲嘢都係徒勞無功 (in vain; futile)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 指有多種揾錢來源，或指周遊世界各地去揾錢 (to have several different ways of making money; or to make money by travelling all over the world. Literally: to make money from 4 directions.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 香港一向都係揾四方錢，匯聚世界各地資金同貨物，無話無左邊個唔得。
examples.translation: Hong Kong can always make a living from several sources. This place gathers capital and goods from all over the world, and there is no such thing as missing anyone of them that can make Hong Kong die.

senses.definition: 照顧傷患 (to nurse; to care for; to take care of)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 扭傷 (to sprain)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我屈親個腳踝，宜家出唔到街。
examples.translation: I sprained my ankle, and I cannot go out now.

senses.definition: 着得暖、食得飽呢啲基本生活需要 (feeling of warmth and fullness; the basic necessities of life)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 依個世界仲有大把人連三餐温飽都成問題。
examples.jyutping: ji1 go3 sai3 gaai3 zung6 jau5 daai6 baa2 jan4 lin4 saam1 caan1 wan1 baau2 dou1 sing4 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: There are still many people in this world who can't even afford basic necessities.

senses.definition: 重要嘅人物、客户、嘉賓等 (VIP; special guest)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: This room is only exclusive for VIP.

senses.definition: 一齊經歷過患難嘅朋友；冇因為其中一方落難而絕交嘅朋友 (friend in adversity; friendship that stands the test of time)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 人嘅感情唔會受挫折影響，關係仍然能夠維繫 (one's true heart can be seen in difficult times; genuine relationships can survive hardships)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 完全壞咗，完全唔識郁 (totally out of order)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 部機軭神咗一排喇，整都整唔返。
examples.jyutping: bou6 gei1 waang1 san2 zo2 jat1 paai2 laa3, zing2 dou1 zing2 m4 faan1.
examples.translation: That machine is totally out of order. No one can fix it.

senses.definition: #抵死 (to get the bad consequence one deserves)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 jan4 daa2? dai2 sei2!
examples.translation: He was beaten? Yeah, he deserve that!

senses.definition: 同人交流嗰陣，解讀對方果陣解讀錯 (to misunderstand what others are trying to convey)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 wui6 co3 ji3 tim1, zan1 hai6 gaam3 gaai3 laa3.
examples.translation: (I have just realized that) I have misunderstood his meaning. It is really embarrassing.

senses.definition: 搶走他人伴侶 (to take away something that is loved by another; literally: to snatch the beloved with a knife)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢曾經被朋友橫刀奪愛，所以佢對愛情冇晒信心。
examples.translation: She was once supplanted in her lover's affections by her friend, so she will not believe in love anymore.

senses.definition: 精神狀態迷糊 (in a state of unconsciousness/stupor; dazed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 食完藥之後，成個人温温燉。
examples.jyutping: sik6 jyun4 joek6 zi1 hau6, sing4 go3 jan4 wan1 wan1 dan6.
examples.translation: After taking the medicine, I was dazed.

senses.definition: 表皮黃色嘅#大豆（量詞：粒／拃） (yellow soybean)

senses.definition: #推諉 過失 (to put the blame on sb)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to put the blame on the others

senses.definition: 象徵帝王權威嘅圓形頭飾，通常用#金 之類嘅貴金屬鑄造，再鑲上寶石裝飾（量詞：頂／個） (crown; a circular decoration for the head, signifying the imperial power, usually made of gold and jewels (= precious stones))

senses.definition: #單身#男人（量詞：個） (unmarried man; bachelor)

examples.text: 美元兑日圓連升三日，今日回軟。

examples.translation: exchange rate US dollar to Japanese yen rose for 3 days, it softens today.

senses.definition: 花嘅一種 (tulip)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 買紮鬱金香俾女朋友啦！
examples.jyutping: maai5 zaat3 wat1 gam1 hoeng1 bei2 neoi5 pang4 jau5 laa1!
examples.translation: You should buy a bouquet of tulips for your girlfriend!

senses.definition: #靈魂（量詞：個） (soul; spiritual essence inhabiting a body)

examples.jyutping: jan4 sei2 zo2 zi1 hau6, wan4 paak3 zau6 wui5 lei4 hoi1 jan4 tai2.

senses.definition: 蔬菜名；短身，葉淺綠色，菜#梗 白色，長啲嘅叫做#黃芽白 (a small variety of Chinese cabbage; it has white stems and light green leaves)

senses.definition: 做嘢#揾錢 維生；有一種#得過且過，唔會太認真或者#落力，只係為咗份人工先做嘢嘅意思 (to make a living, to try and make a living; with some meaning of muddle along, being not so serious, not whole-hearted, only work for the wage. Literally: to find two meals)

examples.text: 揾兩餐啫，唔使揾命博㗎。
examples.jyutping: wan2 loeng5 caan1 ze1, m4 sai2 wan2 meng6 bok3 gaa3.

senses.definition: 又長又窄，用有彈性嘅物料整嘅板，一隻腳戴一塊，另外需要兩隻手揸住兩枝棍嚟到喺輔助滑雪；亦都會叫做雙板 (skis)
即係#烏龍茶（量詞：杯／壺） (oolong tea)

senses.definition: #簽證（量詞：張） (travel visa; permission to enter a territory as a foreigner)

senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #買大細 嗰陣，開出三粒骰點數一樣。玩家無論買大買細都當輸（除非你買圍骰），呢樣叫莊家#通殺 。 (triples - in the game of Tai-Sai ("Big Small", or Sicbo), when all three dices show the same number, bets on both "small" or "big" will lose (except for those who bet on triples); "dealer takes all")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 連開二十鋪細，諗住買大啦，點知開圍骰！
examples.jyutping: lin4 hoi1 ji6 sap6 pou1 sai3, nam2 zyu6 maai5 daai6 laa1, dim2 zi1 hoi1 wai4 sik1!
examples.translation: The result was "small" for the last 20 rounds, so I bet on "big" this time -- but alas it's triples this time!

examples.jyutping: wing6 sau2

examples.jyutping: gat1 hing3 wai4
examples.translation: Kat Hing Wai

senses.definition: #基圍 (gei wai, pond enclosed by an earth bund)

examples.jyutping: naam4 sang1 wai4
examples.translation: Nam Sang Wai

senses.definition: 周圍嘅長度 (measurement around something)

examples.jyutping: hung1 wai4

senses.definition: 建立#圍牆 包圍及標誌邊界嘅#村落（量詞：條） (walled village)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 衙前圍係香港最後嘅市區圍村。
examples.jyutping: ngaa4 cin4 wai4 hai6 hoeng1 gong2 zeoi3 hau6 ge3 si5 keoi1 wai4 cyun1.

senses.definition: 計算大圓枱嘅量詞 (big circular table)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 wai4 toi2
examples.translation: a table

senses.definition: 同人關係友善，容易令佢哋願意同你做生意，帶嚟更多收入 (amiability makes you rich)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 一種柔軟、表面帶有絨毛嘅合成纖維布料，有羊毛嘅保暖優點，但重量輕得多而且易清洗 (polar fleece)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我件褸抓毛嘅，幾凍都唔怕。
examples.translation: My jacket is made of fleece, I will survive no matter how cold the weather is.

senses.definition: 好耐之前嘅日子 (in the old days)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 往時坐電車一毫子㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: wong5 si2 co5 din6 ce1 jat1 hou4 zi2 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: In the old days the tram was only 10 cents.

senses.definition: 死者生前影嘅#相（量詞：幅／張） (photograph of the deceased)

examples.text: 估唔到我幫佢影嘅最後一張相，就係佢嘅遺照。
examples.jyutping: gu2 m4 dou3 ngo5 bong1 keoi5 jing2 ge3 zeoi3 hau6 jat1 zoeng1 soeng2, zau6 hai6 keoi5 ge3 wai4 ziu3.
examples.translation: I never thought that the last photo that I took for him would be used as his funeral photograph.

senses.definition: 即係死後嘅世界；「泉」指井水，黃泉就係泥黃色嘅井水，只會係掘到好深嘅地方，因為地下水嘅沉積物出現先見到，代指人死後嘅地下世界 (underworld; netherworld; the "Yellow Springs")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lok6 zo2 wong4 cyun4
examples.translation: passed away; passed into the underworld

senses.definition: 一種#中樂 嘅拉弦樂器，以弓弦 #磨擦 琴絃，令佢#振動 以發出#聲音 嘅#樂器（量詞：部） (Huqin; a family of bowed string instruments in Chinese music, producing sound when a set of strings is pulled, hit, or rubbed with a bow)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 擁有唔同種族嘅血統 (mixed-race; multiracial)
senses.label: 區別詞

senses.definition: 幫手#接生 嘅女性喺古時嘅稱呼 ((ancient) female midwife)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 模擬天體運行嘅儀器 (armillary sphere; celestial globe)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #袈裟；佛教僧侶着嘅長袍（量詞：件） (kasaya; a kind of robe worn by Buddhist monks and nuns)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種有左、右兩塊衣襟嘅BB衫（量詞：件） (monk's robe for babies)
#賺錢；賺取收入 (to make a living; to make money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wan2 ngan2 zeoi3 gan2 jiu3.
examples.translation: Earning money comes first.

senses.definition: 賺返本錢、成本 (to recover an initial cost; to break even on an original investment)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jyu6 gai3 loeng5 nin4 noi6 wui4 dou2 bun2.
examples.translation: She expects to recoup her original investment within two years.

senses.definition: 一直都憎某個人，記住對佢嘅怨恨 (to bear a grudge; to nurse hatred)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢一直懷恨在心，等機會報仇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 zik6 waai4 han6 zoi6 sam1, dang2 gei1 wui6 bou3 sau4.
examples.translation: All along, he's had a grudge and has been waiting for a chance for revenge.

senses.definition: 形容食物或者飲品喺口腔度剩低有清甜嘅味道 (to come with a sweet aftertaste)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 果然係靚茶，又香，又回甘。
examples.jyutping: gwo2 jin4 hai6 leng3 caa4, jau6 hoeng1, jau6 wui4 gam1.
examples.translation: As expected, it is nice tea. It smells good and has a sweet aftertaste.

senses.definition: 喺活動裏面製造麻煩或者進行破壞，目的係激嬲人或者令人掃興 (to provoke a person or a situation; to cause trouble)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: waan2 cyun4 go3 paa1 ti4
examples.translation: to make trouble

senses.definition: 返去老本行或舊公司工作 (to return to a decent trade or a honest occupation)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 由於#孔子 有一句「久矣吾不復夢見#周公」（我已經好耐冇夢到周公），後世就用「周公」形容人瞓覺發夢。 (to go to bed; to go to sleep; literally: to find the Zhou prince)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我琴晚一早就去咗揾周公喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 kam4 maan5 jat1 zou2 zau6 heoi3 zo2 wan2 zau1 gung1 laa3.
examples.translation: Last night I went to sleep early.

senses.definition: 一個數字入面，某個位所代表嘅數值 ((math.) place value)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個位嘅位值係1，十位嘅位值係10，如此類推。

senses.definition: 揾方法或者機會賺錢 (to find a way to make money; to look for a chance to make money; literally "to find rice path")
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 形容人覺得好#羞恥、#樣衰、#冇面，唔想見人，淨係想自己一個匿埋喺個窿到 (used to describe a person who feels so humiliated that he/she wants to dig a hole, bury him/herself, and hide in it; literally 'find a hole to crawl into')
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jyu2 dou3 soeng2 wan2 lung1 gyun1.
examples.translation: I was so embarrassed that I felt like digging and hole and crawling into it.

senses.definition: 以較快嘅速度賺錢，一般指非正途、甚至犯法嘅賺錢方式 (to make money quickly, often implies a method that is considered improper, unscrupulous, or even criminal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢想揾快錢，去咗做私影。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 soeng2 wan2 faai3 cin2, heoi3 zo2 zou6 si1 jing2.
examples.translation: She wants to make a big quick buck and became a private photography model.

senses.definition: 當人#傻瓜；佔人便宜 (to trick; to defraud)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 mong6 faat3 daat6 jat1 mei2 kaau3 wan2 ding1.
examples.translation: Hoping to get rich by being a con artist.

senses.definition: 為咗維持生計 (to try to earn a living; in order to make a living)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 一個人為兩餐可以去到幾盡？
examples.jyutping: jat1 go3 jan4 wai6 loeng5 caan1 ho2 ji5 heoi3 dou3 gei2 zeon6?
examples.translation: How far would a person go to make a living?

senses.definition: 為咗#揾食 而奔波勞碌 (to work extremely hard to make a living; to make ends meet; literally: to run around for one's mouth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩公婆成日都要為口奔馳，都冇時間湊個仔。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 gung1 po2 seng4 jat6 dou1 jiu3 wai6 hau2 ban1 ci4, dou1 mou5 si4 gaan3 cau3 go3 zai2.
examples.translation: This couple has to devote all their waking hours to make ends meet and consequently little can be devoted to their son.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
專責保護一個人或者一啲嘢嘅人 (bodyguard)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 名人身邊通常有好多護衞。
examples.translation: There are always a lot of bodyguards around famous people.

senses.definition: 亂講啲冇根據嘅嘢 (to take nonsense; to rave)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 lyun2 gong2!
examples.translation: Don't talk nonsense!

senses.definition: 温度相對比較高，唔凍得嚟又唔會太熱，係令人舒適嘅天氣 (pleasantly warm)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 可以容納一定數量嘅觀眾，通常係露天嘅球場（量詞：個） (athletic field; sports ground)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #包含；#包括 (to contain; to embrace; to hold in store)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 中華文化藴含好多博大精深嘅道理。
examples.jyutping: zung1 waa4 man4 faa3 wan5 ham4 hou2 do1 bok3 daai6 zing1 sam1 ge3 dou6 lei5.
examples.translation: There are many meaningful sayings included in the long history of Chinese culture.

senses.definition: 喺#頭 嘅兩側、雙#眼 後面嘅位置（量詞：個） ((of human body) temple)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 揾啲藥油搽落魂精度，睇下會唔會好啲啦！
examples.jyutping: wan2 di1 joek6 jau4 caa4 lok6 wan4 zeng1 dou6, tai2 haa5 wui5 m4 wui5 hou2 di1 laa1!
examples.translation: Apply some herbal oil to your temples, and see if you get better after that.

senses.definition: 結構堅固；唔易歪、唔易散 ((of a structure) solid; firm; stable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 張摺櫈唔係咁穩陣，你不如揾堂梯啦。
examples.jyutping: zoeng1 zip3 dang3 m4 hai6 gam3 wan2 zan6, nei5 bat1 jyu4 wan2 tong4 tai1 laa1.
examples.translation: The folder chair isn't firm enough to stand on. Why don't you get a ladder?

senses.definition: 信得過；可靠 (reliable; secure)

examples.jyutping: gan1 ni1 gaan1 leoi5 hang4 se5 hou2 wan2 zan6.
examples.translation: This travel agency is very reliable.

senses.definition: 維持生計；賺錢去生活落去 (to make a living; literally: to look for food)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 wan2 sik6 gaan1 naan4.
examples.translation: It's hard to make a living now.

senses.definition: 愚弄、欺騙人哋，揾人哋笨，#呃人；睇埋#老襯 (to trick; to defraud; to "con". Literally: find old fool)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢單生意根本就係揾老襯，你唔好做啦。
examples.translation: This deal is just a trick, you better keep away from it.

senses.definition: （動物）#乖巧 ；冇攻擊性；易於控制嘅 ((of animals) docile; harmless; obedient; tame)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: min4 joeng2 hou2 wan1 seon4.
examples.translation: Sheep are tame.

senses.definition: 用嚟#種 嘢嘅地方；係用透明嘅物料起嘅建築物，入面嘅空氣會吸收陽光嘅熱能，而密閉嘅設計令到暖空氣唔會流走，就可以保存陽光帶嚟嘅温暖，同時遮風擋雨，畀農作物係入面安全咁生長 (greenhouse)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: wan1 sat1 haau6 jing3
examples.translation: greenhouse effect

senses.definition: 形容言行舉止温和、順人意 ((of words and acts) gentle; tender; soft)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你講嘢温柔啲，唔好嚇親啲細路啊！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 je5 wan1 jau4 di1, m4 hou2 haak3 can1 di1 sai3 lou6 aa3!
examples.translation: Speak softly. Don't scare the children off.

senses.definition: 物體冷熱嘅程度，數值越高物體越熱，數值越低物體越凍（量詞：個） (temperature)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 九十度係沖咖啡嘅最佳温度。
examples.jyutping: gau2 sap6 dou6 hai6 cung1 gaa3 fe1 ge3 zeoi3 gaai1 wan1 dou6.
examples.translation: 90 degrees (Celsius) is the best temperature of brewing coffee.

senses.definition: 因為疾病、酒精、藥物等等令意識模糊 (to feel dizzy because of illness)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我食完藥成個人都昏昏沌沌，要瞓一瞓先得。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sik6 jyun4 joek6 seng4 go3 jan4 dou1 wan1 wan1 dan6 dan6, jiu3 fan3 jat1 fan3 sin1 dak1.
examples.translation: I feel dizzy after taking a dose. I really need a sleep.

senses.definition: 因為沉迷某啲嘢而失去理智 (to be crazy about something, to fall too deep for something)

examples.text: 佢鐘意人鐘意到昏昏沌沌，乜嘢都肯幫佢做囉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung1 ji3 jan4 zung1 ji3 dou3 wan1 wan1 dan6 dan6, mat1 je5 dou1 hang2 bong1 keoi5 zou6 lo1.
examples.translation: He fell crazy about her and he could do anything for her.

senses.definition: 固定喺底褲度嘅吸濕墊，用嚟索走啲#經血，唔好俾經血整污糟衫褲（量詞：塊） (sanitary pad; sanitary napkin; sanitary towel; menstrual pad)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為怕得罪人而避免直接講一啲説話 (to dare not to speak up; to dare not to tell the truth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢亦都唔再避忌，直接講出殘酷嘅事實。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jik6 dou1 m4 zoi3 bei6 gei6, zik6 zip3 gong2 ceot1 caan4 huk6 ge3 si6 sat6.
examples.translation: He is not afraid to tell the brutal truth now.

senses.definition: 色水好多變又鮮豔，令人有迷幻感覺 (dazzlingly colourful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿娜佢著住件幻彩衫上台唱歌。
examples.translation: A-na went on stage to sing in her dazzlingly colourful outfit.

senses.definition: 對其他人嘅攻勢進行反擊 (to fight back; to counterattack)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 wai6 waan4 gik1
examples.translation: to self-protect and counterattack

senses.definition: 擁有才華但遇唔到人賞識 (to have unrecognised talents)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢認為自己揾唔到工係懷才不遇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jing6 wai4 zi6 gei2 wan2 m4 dou2 gung1 hai6 waai4 coi4 bat1 jyu6.
examples.translation: He thinks that he could not find any jobs because his talents were simply not recognised.

senses.definition: 惡意批評人哋嘅説話 (vicious, critical remarks about others)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gong2 jan4 waai6 waa2
examples.translation: to bad-mouth somebody

senses.definition: 一種游水嘅泳式，因為雙腳嘅動作好似青蛙，所以叫蛙泳 ((of swimming) breast stroke.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我最鍾意游蛙泳㗎啦！因為游得好舒服！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 jau4 waa1 wing6 gaa2 laa1! jan1 wai4 jau4 dak1 hou2 syu1 fuk6!
examples.translation: I love to swim breast stroke the best, as I can swim very comfortably!

senses.definition: #暖；形容温度唔會點跌，令人感到舒適 (warmth)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: wan1 nyun5
examples.translation: warm

senses.definition: #温度；物體有幾#熱 嘅幅度 (temperature)

examples.jyutping: hang4 wan1
examples.translation: constant temperature

senses.definition: #乾淨、#清潔，唔會令人#病 (hygienic; sanitary)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 街邊流動小販賣嘅嘢食好唔衞生。
examples.jyutping: gaai1 bin1 lau4 dung6 siu2 faan2 maai6 ge3 je5 sik6 hou2 m4 wai6 sang1.
examples.translation: The food that the hawkers sell in the streets is unhygienic.

senses.definition: 唔想答應其他人嘅要求，又被迫要做，而覺得#無奈 (unwilling)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 老闆叫佢打俾個客。佢個樣好為難噉。
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 giu3 keoi5 daa2 bei2 go3 haak3, keoi5 go3 joeng2 hou2 wai4 naan4 gam2.

senses.definition: 温和善良、和藹；心地好 (amiable; good-natured)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個人好和善，好容易相處。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 jan4 hou2 wo4 sin6, hou2 jung4 ji6 soeng1 cyu3.

senses.definition: 展現和藹喜悦嘅面色 (to look kind and nice)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 對人和顏悦色，人都會受歡迎啲。
examples.jyutping: deoi3 jan4 wo4 ngaan4 jyut6 sik1, jan4 dou1 wui5 sau6 fun1 jing4 di1.

senses.definition: #回歸線 同#極圈 之間四季分明嘅地帶 ((geography) temperate)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 重温經驗，而獲得新嘅體會 (to gain new understanding by reviewing the old experience)

senses.definition: 形容人態度温和，舉止文雅 (gentle and cultivated)

examples.text: 匡生一向都係咁温文爾雅。
examples.jyutping: hong1 sang1 jat1 hoeng3 dou1 hai6 gam3 wan1 man4 ji5 ngaa5.
examples.translation: Hong-sang is always a learned gentleman.

senses.definition: 亂咁講，冇嚟根據 (to make irresponsible remarks)

senses.definition: 一種男女合跳、以三拍音樂為舞曲嘅社交舞 (waltz (dance))

senses.definition: 每小節三拍嘅舞曲，第一拍重，後兩拍輕，又稱為圓舞曲 (waltz (music); music of 3 counts per bar, with accent on the first count of each bar)
好快；嘢都未講完就已經完成、發生 (happened quickly; very fast; literally: to happen faster than it is spoken)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 英屬香港時中港邊境對中國範圍嘅稱呼，對面係#英界 ((before 1997 handover) mainland China area, relative to Hong Kong area)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 清末至民國時期，各國喺天津、上海等地設立#租界，中方管治嘅部分就係華界 (Chinese part of Shanghai, Tian Jin etc before 1945, opposite to other parts that were rented by foreigners)
一種糕點；源於印尼；用椰汁、牛油、木薯粉、酵母、雞蛋同砂糖整，發酵後攞去焗，外表金黃色（量詞：件／嚿） (golden sponge cake; bika ambon or golden bika)

senses.definition: #包圍 一個地方，再殲滅入面嘅目標 (to encircle and suppress, esp. enemies or criminals)

examples.jyutping: tou2 fei2 bei6 gun1 bing1 wai4 ziu2
examples.translation: The bandits were encircled and suppressed by the official army.

senses.definition: 一班人入面 (within a group)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋圍內傾開偈，係熟啲㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 wai4 noi2 king1 hoi1 gai2, hai6 suk6 di1 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: They often chat with other members in their group. Indeed they're familiar with one another.

senses.definition: #臣子、官員；並唔等於#宦官 嘅意思 (servant; official)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #計落；計過數之後；考慮晒每一個方面之後 (considering every aspect; in sum)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.translation: All considering, this lot of goods is a bargain.

senses.definition: 會俾人#講、批評或者#抽秤 嘅錯事或者缺失 (pretext for gossip or matter for derision)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ziu1 jan4 waa6 beng3
examples.translation: to become a subject for gossip or ridicule; to lay someone open to derision

senses.definition: 去返以前做過嘅公司度做 (to work again in the company in which the person worked before; literally: to return to the nest)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 鄧生間舊公司力邀佢回巢擔任高層救亡。
examples.jyutping: dang6 saang1 gaan1 gau6 gung1 si1 lik6 jiu1 keoi5 wui4 caau4 daam1 jam6 gou1 cang4 gau3 mong4.
examples.translation: Mr. Tang's old company urged him to enter its management for its survival.

senses.definition: 穩定、健全；保持到正面發展 (stable; steady; sound)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 香港銀行體系十分穩健，銀行有充足流動資金應付公眾嘅需要。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 ngan4 hong4 tai2 hai6 sap6 fan1 wan2 gin6, ngan4 hong4 jau5 cung1 zuk1 lau4 dung6 zi1 gam1 jing3 fu6 gung1 zung3 ge3 seoi1 jiu3.
examples.translation: The Hong Kong banking system is robust and sound. Banks have sufficient supply of banknotes to meet the needs of the public.

senses.definition: 形容人橫蠻無理，不可理喻 ((of characters and manners) arbitrary; difficult; stubborn; to give bad reasons or justifications)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你都橫繃繃㗎，明明係你踩我，而家話我踢你！
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 waang4 baang1 baang6 gaa3, ming4 ming4 hai6 nei5 caai2 ngo5, ji4 gaa1 waa6 ngo5 tek3 nei5!
examples.translation: You are so arbitrary! You stepped on me and now you said I kicked you!

senses.definition: 濫刻濫製、無用嘅書。古人刻書多用棗木、梨木做材料，因此濫刻沒有價值嘅書籍，只會白白令使梨樹、棗樹受到災禍。 (to bring disaster upon jujube or pear tree)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #運費 (transportation expense)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 中國古代對日本同埋日本人嘅稱呼。 (an old name for Japan and Japanese, created by the ancient Chinese)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: wo1 jan4
examples.translation: Wajin

senses.definition: 形容一樣嘢好靚，閃閃生光，細節講究優美 (elegant; beautiful; glamorous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: waa4 lai6 ge3 zong1 sik1
examples.translation: elegant decoration

senses.definition: 無論如何；#畢竟；用嚟陳述一個較為優先嘅關係，同埋因而有嘅合理期望 (after all; in spite of everything)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢話晒都係你阿哥，你哋應該互相照應嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 waa6 saai3 dou1 hai6 nei5 aa3 go1, nei5 dei6 jing1 goi1 wu6 soeng1 ziu3 jing3 ge3.
examples.translation: After all, he is your brother. You should help out each other.

senses.definition: 闊；大 (wide, spacious)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: majestic

senses.definition: 湖水波光加上山中景色嘅自然美景 (the natural beauty of lakes and mountains)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為咩原因 (why; for what reason)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: wai6 mat1 nei5 jiu3 dou2 dou3 po3 caan2?
examples.translation: Why did you have to gamble so much that you became bankrupt?

senses.definition: 講究#押韻 嘅文體 (verse; poetry)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以行動表示謝意或者回報，例如做義工、捐錢等等 (to give back)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wui4 gwai3 se5 wui2
examples.translation: to give back to society

senses.definition: 評價某個人嘅表現，以幫助對方改善同進步 (feedback)

examples.jyutping: wui4 gwai3 hok6 saang1
examples.translation: to give feedback to students

senses.definition: 對某啲嘢有#疑惑，但係冇充分證據 (to doubt; to suspect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 waai4 ji4 ngo5 lou5 gung1 jau5 ngoi6 jyu6.
examples.translation: I suspect that my husband has an affair.

senses.definition: #黑口黑面 (looking angry or unhappy)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #帝王 ，古代用嚟稱呼國家嘅元首 (量詞：個) (imperial person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: wong4 ze2 fung1 faan6
examples.translation: emperor-like manner; Figuratively, the best or the strongest of their kind

senses.definition: 不擇手段咁夾硬作啲嘢出嚟冤枉人 (to fabricate charges or evidence against somebody in a morally indiscriminate manner; the expression literally means 'frame somebody whenever possible' and is often used to protest against false accusations)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我絕對冇做過啲噉嘅事，對天發誓都仲得，你唔好屈得就屈。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zyut6 deoi3 mou5 zou6 gwo3 di1 gam2 ge3 si6, deoi3 tin1 faat3 sai6 dou1 zung6 dak1, nei5 m4 hou2 wat1 dak1 zau6 wat1.
examples.translation: I can swear I didn't do anything like that - stop your false accusations.

senses.definition: 即係#竹枝詞；入面會介紹香港地方同鄉村（量詞：首） (village names in a song, a.k.a. Zhuzhici poems; see also #竹枝詞)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唯讀嘅影音#光碟；由於容量只有大約650至747MB，畫質冇#DVD 咁好（量詞：隻／張） (VCD; video compact disc)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 拖延時間、爭取可以解決問題嘅時間嘅計策 (the strategy to play for time, literally "the strategy of delaying the advance of the enemy")
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 一種餅乾；口感鬆脆，係由好多層好薄嘅餅做成嘅，每層中間會有夾心（量詞：塊） (wafer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 對人、對事物嘅唔好嘅影響、結果（量詞：個） (disadvantage; bad consequence)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyu6 dai1 cang4 jau5 me1 waai6 cyu3?
examples.translation: What are the disadvantages of living on a lower floor?

senses.definition: 用一個人嘅#威勢 或者有利之處去逼另一個人做一件事 (to force somebody to do something with his advantageous position)

examples.translation: A criminal organisation forces some women to prostitute themselves.

examples.jyutping: zik1 si2 min6 lam4 wai1 bik1 lei6 jau5, ngo5 dei6 ji1 jin4 zyut6 bat1 teoi3 joeng6.
examples.translation: Despite coercion and induction, we still never yield in.

examples.jyutping: daai6 haa6 ngoi6 coeng4 mok1 lok6, seoi1 jiu3 wai4 sau1.
examples.translation: The paint on exterior walls of the building is flaking and needs repairing.

senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: We're asking whether you committed theft, not whether you were hungry. Don't try to fool us!

senses.definition: 假嘅；屬於虛構；想像出嚟嘅 (unreal; illusory)

senses.definition: 小心翼翼、按步驟、穩妥(咁做事) ((to do things) carefully; step by step; reliably)

examples.translation: He's a reliable worker, you can count on him.

蠢蠢哋；懵懵地；唔得醒目 (stupid, slow-witted, "brainless")

senses.definition: 形容採取安撫手段嚟控制某人 (to make a show of conciliation in order to bring someone under control)

examples.jyutping: waai4 jau4 zing3 caak3

examples.translation: Last night, I picked up a piece of stone meteorite at the peak.

jyutping: wong4 tin1 bat1 fu6 jau5 sam1 jan4

senses.definition: 上天唔會辜負有恆心、一直堅持嘅人，會令佢成功；即係話一個人一直堅持同努力，最後有回報嘅意思 (those who persevere shall succeed in the end, literally "the heavens will not fail those who are faithful")

keywords: wong4 tin1 bat1 fu6 jau5 sam1 jan4
wong tin bat fu jau sam jan

senses.definition: 喺#維園 聚集嘅一批年長男性，多數都係建制派嘅支持者。《城市論壇》喺大涼亭直播嘅時候，一有泛民嘅嘉賓喺台上發言，佢哋就會喺場內場外大聲叫囂。（量詞：班／個） (Uncles of Victoria Park; a group of aged men, usually pro-Beijing, who gather at Victoria Park every Sunday and are known to disrupt the live broadcast of City Forum - a public forum organised by Radio Television Hong Kong (RTHK) - by yelling outside and inside the venue whenever pan-democratic guests make a speech on stage.)

senses.definition: 行使唔正當手段所賺嘅錢 (dirty money)

examples.text: 係我殺咗你大佬，你搞我好喇，禍不及妻兒，唔好搞我屋企人。
examples.jyutping: hai6 ngo5 saat3 zo2 nei5 daai6 lou2, nei5 gaau2 ngo5 hou2 laa3, wo6 bat1 kap6 cai1 ji4, m4 hou2 gaau2 ngo5 uk1 kei2 jan4.

senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢塊面滑到好似剝殼雞蛋噉。

examples.translation: The rhyme of 'cake' is 'ake'.

senses.definition: #中國 嘅五大民族之一。係歷史上#阿拉伯、#波斯、同埋中亞地區嗰度嘅人遷徙到中國所形成嘅。主要分佈喺#新疆、#青海、#甘肅、同#陝西 呢啲西面嘅省。喺明朝之後，漢語做咗回族嘅共同語言，但係依然信#回教。 (The Hui Nationality, an ethnic minority in China;)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 九龍有間好正嘅回族餐館喎，去試吓咯。
examples.translation: There's a great Hui-style restaurant in Kowloon. Let's go try it out.

senses.definition: #日本 風格 (Japanese style)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Look, the newly open Japanese restaurant down the street has cherry blossoms and waiters dressed in kimono. It sure is Japanese style!

senses.definition: 一種集體遊戲：一位玩家負責擔任狐狸先生，一路企響一埲牆前面，其他玩家企響起步線問「狐狸先生幾多點？」，狐狸先生答幾點，其他人就要跟住踏出幾多步（行到埋牆就要擰轉身繼續），重複直到狐狸覺得玩家夠近，先至會答「十二點」然後衝出去捉嗰啲冇掂住牆嘅人。 ("What time is it Mr. Fox" (a children's game); literally "Mr. Fox, how many o'clock?")

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam1 nin2 tau4 zi1 gu2 piu3 wok6 lei6 m4 siu2.
examples.translation: He makes a fortune in stocks investment this year.

senses.definition: 宣揚；推廣；普及 (to expand and publicise; to promote)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wang4 joeng4 fat6 faat3
examples.translation: to propagate Buddhism

senses.definition: 將物件搬離原先嘅地方 (to carry; to transport)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wan6 sung3
examples.translation: to transport

senses.definition: 勉強維持生活 (to eke out one's living)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 原裝版嘅東鐵電氣化火車，因為車頭同車尾都係黃色嘅，所以叫做黃頭 (KCR East Rail Metro-Cammell EMU in original configuration, known for their yellow cabs; literally "yellow head")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 名人喺退休或者過身之後講述前事嘅著作（量詞：本） (memoirs)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以線、點表達實相或者意象 (to draw a picture)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 大頭蝦；大意 ((compare #論盡 leon6zeon6 sense 2) absent-minded; careless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我真係烏龍，又唔記得帶銀包。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zan1 hai6 wu1 lung2, jau6 m4 gei3 dak1 daai3 ngan4 baau1.
examples.translation: I'm so absent-minded that I've forgotten to bring my wallet again.

senses.definition: 亂咁諗野 (with one's thoughts wandering)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 口講；掛名；名義上 (nominally; only in name)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢哋話名係親戚，其實好少來往。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 waa6 meng2 hai6 can1 cik1, kei4 sat6 hou2 siu2 loi4 wong5.
examples.translation: They are relatives in name, but in fact they don't contact much.
